page_values.title: Page Title
page_values.description: Description text which may appear in search engines etc.

parts.text:
## Welcome!

Welcome to Dummylander sample page. The page is built on parts which may contain text and images. The flower and a heading above is the first parts while this text is a second part.

The text fields may contain [markdown-formatted](https://www.markdownguide.org/cheat-sheet) syntax. This allows you to give **structure** to your text.

## Fonts

Each part may have its own font definition. It is easy to use [open fonts delivered by Google](https://fonts.google.com/).

This part uses *Shadows Into Light* font.

## Font Color

The font color can be changed for each part.

## Tables

Tables are particulary easy to create with markdown syntax:

| Service | Price |
| ------- | ------- |
| Some Service | 25 € |
| Some other service | 35 € |
| A third service | 55 € |

## Images

Markdown syntax allows you to add images:

![Alternative text!](favicon.ico)

## HTML You are not limited to the quick and easy markdown syntax. [The syntax](https://www.markdownguide.org/cheat-sheet) allows you to embed HTML tags. Here we have a clickable image: [](https://duckduckgo.com/)
